ygData.subject: Re: Old memories die hard.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She looked at Lunarpine.  Absence? Where did you go? Are you from the Cybertron fire? ... little until ... Lunarpine ... Maximal ... unexpected ...

::SnowCat::

She looked at Lunarpine.  "Absence? Where did you go? Are you from 
the Cybertron fire?"




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lunarpine smelled somebody approaching him . he stepped back a 
little until
> he could get a better look. SnowCat had already spotted him. 
Lunarpine
> nearly paniced  as her questions flew at him. "I'm Lunarpine, 
Maximal
> Nocturnal recon specialist, previously stationed here before my 
unexpected
> leave of absence" He looked her in the eyes glareing as if in a 
stareing
> contest.
> 
> Lunarpine followed the echoing halls to the room Ramulus was in. A 
table
> with what appeared to be weapons sat next to him full of a new form 
of gun
> he couldn't quite recognize. He listened to the conversation 
between the Ark
> and the Cybertronian fire.
> 
> "If it's reinforcements you need just turn around." The new body of
> Lunarpine stepped into the room curious as to what his comerade in 
arms
> would think and how he'd react to the remodel.
> 
> 
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <Yanshosh@a...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, October 04, 2000 7:11 AM
> Subject: Re: Old memories die hard.
> 
> 
> > ::Ramulus/Firearm/Proto/Kluster/Grimmler/Slayer::
> >
> > Ramulus glances at the weapons on the table once more, 
nodding. "Allright,
> > I'll ask the Cybertronian Fire for reinforcements and equipment, 
then
> we'll
> > be ready. If this breaks out into a battle, we can't be 
unprepared."
> >
> > He taps his comm-link, sending a transmission to the Cybertronian 
Fire,
> > requesting troops and a dozen or so cloaking devices.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > Kluster turns around to face the console as Ramulus' transmission 
comes
> in.
> > He sighs, tapping his comm-link.
> >
> > "Firearm, Proto," he says into it, "Your assistance is needed at 
the Ark,
> > quickly. Bring a dozen cloaking devices with you."
> >
> > "On my way," both Proto and Firearm respond, both of them running 
off
> toward
> > the equipment rooms.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > Grimmler nods, contacting Kluster to verify what this bot was 
saying.
> >
> > "Hey," he says into his comm-link, "There's a bot here that says 
you told
> me
> > to go with him. His name's Valtron."
> >
> > "Yeah," Kluster's voice replies, "I told him to go. Report to me
> > periodically, I want to know what's happening."
> >
> > Grimmler looks back at Valtron. "Allright, I guess I'm going with 
you," he
> > says, ready to follow Valtron.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > Slayer recieves Prebon's orders, walking toward the bridge, his 
suit still
> on
> > him.
> >
> > He enters, his red optics scanning across the bots in the room, 
growling
> as
> > he sees Spears. Slayer turns to Prebon, bowing slightly.
> >
> > "I am ready to kill this Ramulus, Master," he says, glancing 
threateningly
> at
> > Spears as he does so.
> >
> >
> >
